comments.body: I think we should turn `RootPageNode => Unit` and `(RootPageNode, DokkaContext) => Unit` into traits and provide helper methods, e.g. option to inspect all pages or output of rendering or location of rendered page

  case AfterPagesTransformation(fn: RootPageNode => Unit)
  case AfterRendering(fn: (RootPageNode, DokkaContext) => Unit)
